abstract: Several big energy conglomerates are in initial discussions to buy or form a joint venture with Toreador Resources, an independent oil and natural gas company that operates primarily in France, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
snippet: Several big energy conglomerates are in initial discussions to buy or form a joint venture with Toreador Resources, an independent oil and natural gas company that operates primarily in France, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Several big energy conglomerates are in initial discussions to buy or partner with the Toreador Resources Corporation, an independent oil and natural gas company that operates primarily in France, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
